                  watchdog_enable PROC
;;;11062  //-----------------------------------------------
;;;11063  void watchdog_enable (void) 
009d96  4959              LDR      r1,|L2.40700|
;;;11064  {
;;;11065  LPC_WDT->WDTC=2000000;
009d98  05c8              LSLS     r0,r1,#23
009d9a  6041              STR      r1,[r0,#4]
;;;11066  LPC_WDT->WDCLKSEL=0;
009d9c  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
009d9e  6101              STR      r1,[r0,#0x10]
;;;11067  LPC_WDT->WDMOD=3;
009da0  2103              MOVS     r1,#3
009da2  7001              STRB     r1,[r0,#0]
;;;11068  LPC_WDT->WDFEED=0xaa;
009da4  21aa              MOVS     r1,#0xaa
009da6  7201              STRB     r1,[r0,#8]
;;;11069  LPC_WDT->WDFEED=0x55;
009da8  2155              MOVS     r1,#0x55
009daa  7201              STRB     r1,[r0,#8]
;;;11070  }
009dac  4770              BX       lr
;;;11071  
                          ENDP

                  watchdog_reset PROC
;;;11072  //-----------------------------------------------
;;;11073  void watchdog_reset (void) 
009dae  21aa              MOVS     r1,#0xaa
;;;11074  {
;;;11075  LPC_WDT->WDFEED=0xaa;
009db0  0748              LSLS     r0,r1,#29
009db2  7201              STRB     r1,[r0,#8]
;;;11076  LPC_WDT->WDFEED=0x55;
009db4  2155              MOVS     r1,#0x55
009db6  7201              STRB     r1,[r0,#8]
;;;11077  }
009db8  4770              BX       lr
;;;11078  
                          ENDP

                  SysTick_Handler PROC
;;;11084  //***********************************************
;;;11085  void SysTick_Handler (void) 	 /* SysTick Interrupt Handler (1ms)    */

;;;11087  //sys_plazma++;
;;;11088  b2000Hz=1;
